item.title: How to start!
item.author: george.karampelas.26@gmail.com (George Karampelas)
item.description:
Yep every new begining is more difficult than you though after midnigth.

But this is not mean that you can not be a programmer or to start your carrer as programmer, as I believe are small steps every day of learning something new, passion to spend hours infront of your dark theme (or white for the boomers) and eager to explore.

If you have the patience to search on all the Stack over flow or chat with Chat GPT with hours, I’m sorry you are not a programmer. Programmer is that guy that can understand your problem and solve it with technology, he is gonna chose a programming language, framework, database, host and every technology that fits more on your problem/idea…
